field.name: nRST_STDBY
field.brief: Generate a reset instead of entering standby mode
field.description: nRST_STDBY 0: generate a reset instead of entering standby mode 1: no reset when entering standby mode

field.name: nRST_DPSLP
field.brief: Generate a reset instead of entering Deep-sleep mode
field.description: nRST_DPSLP 0: generate a reset instead of entering Deep-sleep mode 1: no reset when entering Deep-sleep mode

field.name: nWDG_HW
field.description: nWDG_HW 0: hardware free watchdog 1: software free watchdog

field.name: BB
field.description: BB 0: boot from bank0, when configured boot from main memory (default value) 1: boot from bank1 or bank0 if bank1 is void, when configured boot from main memory

field.name: BOR_TH
field.description: BOR_TH 00: BOR threshold value 3 01: BOR threshold value 2 10: BOR threshold value 1 11: NO BOR function

field.name: SPC
field.description: Option byte security protection code 0xAA: No protection any value except 0xAA or 0xCC: Protection level low 0xCC: Protection level high

field.name: WP0[7]
field.description: Sector Erase/Program Protection bit 7(0x08060000~0x0807FFFF) 0: Erase/program protection when DRP is 0. No effect when DRP is 1 1: No effect when DRP is 0. Erase/program protection and D-bus read protection when DRP is 1

field.name: WP0[6]
field.description: Sector Erase/Program Protection bit 6(0x08040000~0x0805FFFF) 0: Erase/program protection when DRP is 0. No effect when DRP is 1 1: No effect when DRP is 0. Erase/program protection and D-bus read protection when DRP is 1

field.name: WP0[5]
field.description: Sector Erase/Program Protection bit 5(0x08020000~0x0803FFFF) 0: Erase/program protection when DRP is 0. No effect when DRP is 1 1: No effect when DRP is 0. Erase/program protection and D-bus read protection when DRP is 1

field.name: WP0[4]
field.description: Sector Erase/Program Protection bit 4(0x08010000~0x0801FFFF) 0: Erase/program protection when DRP is 0. No effect when DRP is 1 1: No effect when DRP is 0. Erase/program protection and D-bus read protection when DRP is 1

field.name: WP0[3]
field.description: Sector Erase/Program Protection bit 3(0x0800C000~0x0800FFFF) 0: Erase/program protection when DRP is 0. No effect when DRP is 1 1: No effect when DRP is 0. Erase/program protection and D-bus read protection when DRP is 1

field.name: WP0[2]
field.description: Sector Erase/Program Protection bit 2(0x08008000~0x0800BFFF) 0: Erase/program protection when DRP is 0. No effect when DRP is 1 1: No effect when DRP is 0. Erase/program protection and D-bus read protection when DRP is 1

field.name: WP0[1]
field.description: Sector Erase/Program Protection bit 1(0x08004000~0x08007FFF) 0: Erase/program protection when DRP is 0. No effect when DRP is 1 1: No effect when DRP is 0. Erase/program protection and D-bus read protection when DRP is 1

field.name: WP0[0]
field.description: Sector Erase/Program Protection bit 0(0x08000000~0x08003FFF) 0: Erase/program protection when DRP is 0. No effect when DRP is 1 1: No effect when DRP is 0. Erase/program protection and D-bus read protection when DRP is 1

field.name: DRP
field.description: DRP (DBUS read protection bit) 0: The WP0 bits used as erase/program protection of each sector (Default value) 1: The WP0 bits used as erase/program protection and D-bus read protection of each sector

field.name: DBS
field.brief: Double banks or single bank selection when flash size is 1M bytes
field.description: DBS (Double banks or single bank selection when flash size is 1M bytes) 0: Single bank when flash size is 1M bytes 1: Double banks when flash size is 1M bytes

field.name: WP0[11]
field.description: Sector Erase/Program Protection bit 11(0x080E0000~0x080FFFFF) 0: Erase/program protection when DRP is 0. No effect when DRP is 1 1: No effect when DRP is 0. Erase/program protection and D-bus read protection when DRP is 1

field.name: WP0[10]
field.description: Sector Erase/Program Protection bit 10(0x080C0000~0x080DFFFF) 0: Erase/program protection when DRP is 0. No effect when DRP is 1 1: No effect when DRP is 0. Erase/program protection and D-bus read protection when DRP is 1

field.name: WP0[9]
field.description: Sector Erase/Program Protection bit 9(0x080A0000~0x080BFFFF) 0: Erase/program protection when DRP is 0. No effect when DRP is 1 1: No effect when DRP is 0. Erase/program protection and D-bus read protection when DRP is 1

field.name: WP0[8]
field.description: Sector Erase/Program Protection bit 8(0x08080000~0x0809FFFF) 0: Erase/program protection when DRP is 0. No effect when DRP is 1 1: No effect when DRP is 0. Erase/program protection and D-bus read protection when DRP is 1

field.name: WP1[7]
field.description: Sector Erase/Program Protection bit 7 for Bank1(0x08160000~0x0817FFFF) 0: Erase/program protection when DRP is 0. No effect when DRP is 1 1: No effect when DRP is 0. Erase/program protection and D-bus read protection when DRP is 1

field.name: WP1[6]
field.description: Sector Erase/Program Protection bit 6 for Bank1(0x08140000~0x0815FFFF) 0: Erase/program protection when DRP is 0. No effect when DRP is 1 1: No effect when DRP is 0. Erase/program protection and D-bus read protection when DRP is 1

field.name: WP1[5]
field.description: Sector Erase/Program Protection bit 5 for Bank1(0x08120000~0x0813FFFF) 0: Erase/program protection when DRP is 0. No effect when DRP is 1 1: No effect when DRP is 0. Erase/program protection and D-bus read protection when DRP is 1

field.name: WP1[4]
field.description: Sector Erase/Program Protection bit 4 for Bank1(0x08110000~0x0811FFFF) 0: Erase/program protection when DRP is 0. No effect when DRP is 1 1: No effect when DRP is 0. Erase/program protection and D-bus read protection when DRP is 1

field.name: WP1[3]
field.description: Sector Erase/Program Protection bit 3 for Bank1(0x0810C000~0x0810FFFF) 0: Erase/program protection when DRP is 0. No effect when DRP is 1 1: No effect when DRP is 0. Erase/program protection and D-bus read protection when DRP is 1

field.name: WP1[2]
field.description: Sector Erase/Program Protection bit 2 for Bank1(0x08108000~0x0810BFFF) 0: Erase/program protection when DRP is 0. No effect when DRP is 1 1: No effect when DRP is 0. Erase/program protection and D-bus read protection when DRP is 1

field.name: WP1[1]
field.description: Sector Erase/Program Protection bit 1 for Bank1(0x08104000~0x08107FFF) 0: Erase/program protection when DRP is 0. No effect when DRP is 1 1: No effect when DRP is 0. Erase/program protection and D-bus read protection when DRP is 1

field.name: WP1[0]
field.description: Sector Erase/Program Protection bit 0 for Bank1(0x08100000~0x08103FFF) 0: Erase/program protection when DRP is 0. No effect when DRP is 1 1: No effect when DRP is 0. Erase/program protection and D-bus read protection when DRP is 1

field.name: WP1[11]
field.description: Sector Erase/Program Protection bit 11 for Bank1(Bit 11 controls the protection of the rest flash memory) 0: Erase/program protection when DRP is 0. No effect when DRP is 1 1: No effect when DRP is 0. Erase/program protection and D-bus read protection when DRP is 1

field.name: WP1[10]
field.description: Sector Erase/Program Protection bit 10 for Bank1(0x081C0000~0x081DFFFF) 0: Erase/program protection when DRP is 0. No effect when DRP is 1 1: No effect when DRP is 0. Erase/program protection and D-bus read protection when DRP is 1

field.name: WP1[9]
field.description: Sector Erase/Program Protection bit 9 for Bank1(0x081A0000~0x081BFFFF) 0: Erase/program protection when DRP is 0. No effect when DRP is 1 1: No effect when DRP is 0. Erase/program protection and D-bus read protection when DRP is 1

field.name: WP1[8]
field.description: Sector Erase/Program Protection bit 8 for Bank1(0x08180000~0x0819FFFF) 0: Erase/program protection when DRP is 0. No effect when DRP is 1 1: No effect when DRP is 0. Erase/program protection and D-bus read protection when DRP is 1
